verses.verse: After <S%H310><s%> these things <S%H1697><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> unto Abram <S%H87><s%> in a vision <S%H4236><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Fear <S%H3372><s%> not <S%H87><s%>, Abram: I am thy shield <S%H4043><s%>, and thy exceeding <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H7235><s%> reward <S%H7939><s%>.

And Abram <S%H87><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>, what wilt thou give <S%H5414><s%> me <S%H1980><s%>, seeing I go childless <S%H6185><s%>, and he <S%H1931><s%> that shall be possessor <S%H1121><s%> of my house <S%H1004><s%> is Eliezer <S%H461><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%>?

And Abram <S%H87><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H5414><s%>, to me thou hast given no <S%H3808><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%>: and <S%H1121><s%>, lo, one born in my house <S%H1004><s%> is mine heir <S%H3423><s%>.

And <S%H1697><s%>, behold, the word of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> came unto him <S%H559><s%>, saying, This man shall not be thine heir <S%H3423><s%>; but he that shall come forth <S%H3318><s%> out of thine own bowels <S%H4578><s%> shall be thine heir <S%H3423><s%>.

And he brought him forth <S%H3318><s%> abroad <S%H2351><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Look <S%H5027><s%> now toward heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and number <S%H5608><s%> the stars <S%H3556><s%>, if thou be able <S%H3201><s%> to number <S%H5608><s%> them <S%H559><s%>: and he said unto him <S%H3541><s%>, So shall thy seed be <S%H2233><s%>.
And he believed <S%H539><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; and he reckoned <S%H2803><s%> it to him for righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3068><s%>, I am Jehovah that brought thee out <S%H3318><s%> of Ur <S%H218><s%> of the Chaldees <S%H3778><s%>, to give <S%H5414><s%> thee this land <S%H776><s%> to inherit it <S%H3423><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H136><s%>, whereby <S%H4100><s%> shall I know <S%H3045><s%> that I shall inherit it <S%H3423><s%>?

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3947><s%>, Take me a heifer <S%H5697><s%> three years old <S%H8027><s%>, and a she-goat <S%H5795><s%> three years old <S%H8027><s%>, and a ram <S%H352><s%> three years old <S%H8027><s%>, and a turtle-dove <S%H8449><s%>, and a young pigeon <S%H1469><s%>.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> him all these <S%H1334><s%>, and divided them in the midst <S%H8432><s%>, and laid <S%H5414><s%> each <S%H376><s%> half <S%H1335><s%> over against <S%H7125><s%> the other <S%H7453><s%>: but the birds <S%H6833><s%> divided he not <S%H1334><s%>.
And the birds <S%H5861><s%> of prey came down <S%H3381><s%> upon the carcasses <S%H6297><s%>, and Abram <S%H87><s%> drove them away <S%H5380><s%>.

And when the sun <S%H8121><s%> was going down <S%H935><s%>, a deep sleep <S%H8639><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> upon Abram <S%H87><s%>; and <S%H367><s%>, lo, a horror of great <S%H1419><s%> darkness <S%H2825><s%> fell upon him <S%H5307><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto Abram <S%H87><s%>, Know <S%H3045><s%> of a surety <S%H3045><s%> that thy seed <S%H2233><s%> shall be sojourners <S%H1616><s%> in a land <S%H776><s%> that is not theirs <S%H5647><s%>, and shall serve them <S%H6031><s%>; and they shall afflict them four <S%H702><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>;

and also that nation <S%H1471><s%>, whom they shall serve <S%H5647><s%>, will I judge <S%H1777><s%>: and afterward <S%H310><s%> shall they come out <S%H3318><s%> with great <S%H1419><s%> substance <S%H7399><s%>.
But thou shalt go <S%H935><s%> to thy fathers <S%H1><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%>; thou shalt be buried <S%H6912><s%> in a good <S%H2896><s%> old age <S%H7872><s%>.

And in the fourth <S%H7243><s%> generation <S%H1755><s%> they shall come hither <S%H2008><s%> again <S%H7725><s%>: for the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the Amorite <S%H567><s%> is not yet <S%H2008><s%> full <S%H8003><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H8121><s%>, that, when the sun went down <S%H935><s%>, and it was dark <S%H5939><s%>, behold <S%H6227><s%>, a smoking furnace <S%H8574><s%>, and a flaming <S%H784><s%> torch <S%H3940><s%> that passed <S%H5674><s%> between <S%H996><s%> these pieces <S%H1506><s%>.

In that <S%H1931><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with Abram <S%H87><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, Unto thy seed <S%H2233><s%> have I given <S%H5414><s%> this land <S%H776><s%>, from the river <S%H5104><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> unto the great <S%H1419><s%> river <S%H5104><s%>, the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates <S%H6578><s%>:
the Kenite <S%H7017><s%>, and the Kenizzite <S%H7074><s%>, and the Kadmonite <S%H6935><s%>,
and the Hittite <S%H2850><s%>, and the Perizzite <S%H6522><s%>, and the Rephaim <S%H7497><s%>,
and the Amorite <S%H567><s%>, and the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%>, and the Girgashite <S%H1622><s%>, and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%>.
